{
  "id": "job001",
  "title": "Software Engineer",
  "description": "Develop and maintain software solutions. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design and implement new features.",
  "jobType": "Full-time",
  "salary": 75000.0,
  "location": "San Francisco, CA",
  "companyName": "TechCorp Inc.",
  "companyDescription": "A leading tech company specializing in software solutions.",
  "companyWebsite": "https://www.techcorp.com",
  "minimumQualifications": "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field. Proficiency in Java and Spring Boot.",
  "preferredQualifications": "Experience with cloud computing and microservices architecture.",
  "responsibilities": [
    "Design, develop, and test software applications.",
    "Collaborate with product teams to define requirements.",
    "Ensure code quality and performance optimization."
  ],
  "benefits": [
    "Health insurance",
    "401(k) matching",
    "Paid time off"
  ],
  "applicationDeadline": "2024-12-31",
  "contactEmail": "recruitment@techcorp.com",
  "contactPhone": "+1234567890",
  "createdBy": "admin",
  "createdDate": "2024-11-01",
  "updatedDate": "2024-11-10"
}
